_comment1: Watched folders need to have absolute paths. Both images and documents will be processed from these folders.
_comment2a: The model alias can be found in the models.json file.
_comment2b: Available models are now configured externally in models.json
_comment3b: schedule_type: 'manual' (trigger via API/UI), 'interval' (automatic scheduling), or 'immediate' (generate on file add)
_comment3c: start_hour: Hour of day to start (0-23, used with interval scheduling)
_comment3d: interval_hours: How often to generate embeddings in hours (used with interval scheduling)
